summary.title: Summary
summary.description:
Apt Computing Labs will offer corporate training programs, online courses, and YouTube tutorials to make these topics accessible to a broad audience. You also plan to provide specialized training on Raspberry Pi, Jetson Nano, and Arduino for IoT and embedded projects, meeting the demand for skills in Web3, blockchain, and machine learning/AI.
An essential part of Apt Computing Labs is also helping companies transition from C/C++ to Rust programming, promoting Rust's benefits in terms of safety, performance, and modern tooling. You aim to guide organizations in making this switch, streamlining their projects with Rust's powerful features.

upcomingSessions.topics: Ownership, Borrowing, Concurrency, Error Handling, Traits, Lifetimes, Cargo, Crates, Modules, Testing, Documentation, Macros, Unsafe Code, FFI

upcomingSessions.courseName: Arduino Programming using multiple sensors and actuators
upcomingSessions.topics: Writing simple programs using C/C++ on Arduino Micro Controller

liveProjects: Security Sensors in Linux using Rust

gallery.description: Trainer: Kamal Kumar Mukiri (16 years S/W Industry Experience)
